sense.name: 国家, country,state
sense.commentary: An area of land that forms an independent political unit with its own government.
sense.examples:
第三世界国家。 Third World countries
沿海国家。 coastal state
有关国家 state concerned
友好国家。 friendly country

sense.name: 国家, nation, national ,government
sense.commentary: The offices, departments, and groups of people that control a country, state, city, or other political unit.
sense.examples:
国家大事。 national affairs
国家尊严。 national dignity
国家投资 government investment
国家机关 government offices
